Class StatisticsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.StatisticsService
  • @Singleton
public class StatisticsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for calculating word frequency statistics from video descriptions

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> getWordFrequency​(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String sessionId)
        Get the frequency of all unique words from the descriptions of the top 50 videos based on a search query.
        Parameters:
        query - the search terms for the video
        sessionId - current user session id
        Returns:
        frequency of all unique words from description of top 50 videos based on search query

      • extractAndNormalizeWords

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractAndNormalizeWords​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> description)
        Extracts all words from a list of video titles, normalizes them, and converts them to lowercase for case handling.
        Parameters:
        description - list of video titles
        Returns:
        all words from a list of titles, normalize them and convert to lowercase for case handling

      • countAndSortWordFrequencies

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> countAndSortWordFrequencies​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words)
        Counts the occurrences of each word in the provided list, sorts them by frequency in descending order, and then by the word in alphabetical order. The sorted entries are then collected into a LinkedHashMap to maintain the order.
        Parameters:
        words - the list of words to count and sort
        Returns:
        a map of words and their frequencies, sorted by frequency and then alphabetically

      • getWordOccurences

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> getWordOccurences​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words)
        Count the occurrences of each word in the provided list.
        Parameters:
        words - list of words gathered from titles
        Returns:
        frequency of each word from a list of Words
